title: Lolly and The Holly Berry Tree
description: Lolly is a fairy princess and the best baker in all of Fairy Land. One dreadful morning, a villain named Magellanstomps into her bakery, and claims her Holly Berry Tree!Lolly must devise a plan that forces Magellan to leave.Will Lolly save her bakery?
author: Alicia Sprinkle
